a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTMumpsLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Mumps) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a mumps vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: 2-dose schedule (countries with mumps in schedule and low transmission of measles) * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTMumpsLogic

def.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

expression.name: Client's age is less than 12 months

def.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "No mumps primary series doses were administered"
"Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months"
"Live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks"

Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months
Live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks

def.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first mumps dose as client\'s age is less than 12 months. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.'
"Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with first mumps dose as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.'
"Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with second mumps dose as latest mumps dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 4"

'Should not vaccinate client with second mumps dose as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with first mumps dose as client's age is less than 12 months. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.

when.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with first mumps dose as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.

when.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 3

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with second mumps dose as latest mumps dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.

when.name: Client is not due for mumps vaccination Case 4

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with second mumps dose as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.

def.name: Client is due for mumps vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for mumps vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for mumps vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first mumps dose as the client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for mumps vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with second mumps dose as latest mumps dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and no live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.'

when.name: Client is due for mumps vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should vaccinate client with first mumps dose as the client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for mumps vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should vaccinate client with second mumps dose as latest mumps dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago and no live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Mumps immunization schedule is complete

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"

a:s.a:s: "Two mumps primary series doses were administered"

expression.name: Two mumps primary series doses were administered

a:t.value: Mumps immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.value: Mumps immunization schedule is complete. Two mumps primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.
